questions.text: If you could invent a new subject to be taught in schools, what would it be and why?
Design a new school facility that would improve student learning and wellbeing.
If you were the principal for a day, what three changes would you make to your school?
Imagine you have to solve the problem of plastic pollution in Hong Kong. What creative solution would you propose?
Create a new school event that would promote teamwork and school spirit.
If you could time travel to any period in history, when and where would you go? What would you do there?
Design a mobile app that would help students with their studies.
How would you redesign the traditional classroom to make learning more engaging?
If you could create a new school club, what would it be and what activities would it organize?
Imagine you have unlimited resources to solve one world problem. Which problem would you choose and how would you solve it?
